summary: An email from the FBI Victim Services Division inviting victims of Jeffrey Epstein to attend informational meetings in New York or Florida to learn about available victim services. The document is related to the active investigation under case number NY-3027571.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation for which victim services are being offered; the briefing is for victims of his actions.

events.title: Florida Victim Services Briefing
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in Miramar, FL.

events.title: New York Victim Services Briefing
events.description: A meeting for victims of Jeffrey Epstein to learn about available victim services, held in New York, NY.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division is reaching out to victims of Jeffrey Epstein regarding case number NY-3027571.
Two informational meetings for victims were scheduled for October 15, 2019 in Miramar, FL and October 23, 2019 in New York, NY.
The email states that specific details about the active investigation will not be provided at the meetings.
Victims are invited to attend with one support person and must respond by October 4, 2019 to confirm attendance.
The document indicates an ongoing federal investigation involving the FBI NY Field Office and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
